an6.22:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you these six qualities that ensure you don’t decline. …
an6.22:4.2: And what, mendicants, are the six qualities that ensure you don’t decline?
an6.22:4.3: Not relishing work, talk, sleep, and company, being easy to correct, and having good friends.
an6.22:4.4: These six qualities ensure you don’t decline.
an6.22:5.1: Whether in the past, future and present, all those who have not declined in wholesome qualities do so because of these six qualities.”
